page.title: 17EDUCATION (PART 2)
page.content: CHILDREN ATTENDING YNYSWEN WELSH LANGUAGE SCHOOL RECEIVE THEIR {SECONDARY EDUCATION}AT RHYDYFELIN BILINGUAL SCHOOL,NEAR PONTYPRIDD. AT 11 ALL THE ENGLISH SPEAKING PUPILS TRANSFER TO{TREORCHY COMPREHENSIVE {SCHOOL}_THE ONLY NEW SCHOOL IN THE AREA.THE FIRST PART OPENED IN MAY 1965 AS A SECONDARY SCHOOL.IT BECAME FULLY COMPREHENSIVE BY SEPTEMBER 1970.AT ITS PEAK IT HELD APPROXIMATELY 2000 PUPILS.THE PRESENT ROLL IS 1582.THE SCHOOL CATERS FOR CHILDREN UP TO 16+ OR 18+.SOME LEAVE WITHOUT QUALIFICATIONS,WHILST OTHERS TRY EXTERNAL EXAMINATIONS AT 16,WHICH QUALIFIES THEM FOR ENTRY TO UNIVERSITY ETC.
